verses.name: Ezekiel 42:1
verses.text: Then he brought me forth into the utter court, the way toward the north: and he brought me into the chamber that was over against the separate place, and which was before the building toward the north.

verses.name: Ezekiel 42:2
verses.text: Before the length of an hundred cubits was the north door, and the breadth was fifty cubits.

verses.name: Ezekiel 42:3
verses.text: Over against the twenty cubits which were for the inner court, and over against the pavement which was for the utter court, was gallery against gallery in three stories.
